name: ProscenicRobotic
0:
”Alexa, ask clean bot to start cleaning.”
”Alexa, ask clean bot to start charging.”
”Alexa, ask clean bot for his status.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: clean bot
des:
Want cleaner floors and carpets? Just speak up!
You can control Proscenic robot vacuum cleaner by using only your voice. To get started, make sure you have an ”Proscenic Robotic” account registered in the ”Proscenic Robotic” app and your robot is connected and online.
Then, you just need to enable the ”Proscenic Robotic” skill by clicking on the "Enable” button at the top of this screen. Once the skill is enabled, you will be asked to link with your ”Proscenic Robotic” account. 

When the connection is successfully built, you can simply control robot by saying :
You can control your robot by saying:
"Alexa, ask clean bot to start cleaning.” 
"Alexa, ask clean bot to stop cleaning.”
"Alexa, ask clean bot to start charging.”
"Alexa, ask clean bot to start edge cleaning.”  
"Alexa, ask clean bot to start area cleaning.”   
"Alexa, ask clean bot for his status.”

Tips:You must first bind your machine with "Proscenic Robotic” APP to use the Alexa Voice control.
Please make sure to use your"Proscenic Robotic” account to link Alexa skill.
If any question,please send email to service-tw@proscenic.cn.
